Plot: A doctor hires an escort to seduce her husband, whom she suspects of cheating, though unforeseen events put the family in danger.
Title: Chloe
Writer: Erin Cressida Wilson (screenplay), Anne Fontaine (motion picture "Nathalie")
Actors: Julianne Moore, Liam Neeson, Amanda Seyfried, Max Thieriot
tomatoConsensus: Despite its promising pedigree and a titillating premise, Chloe ultimately fails to deliver the heat -- or the thrills -- expected of a sexual thriller.
